title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Beat eggs and mix with grated parmesan.
Drain pasta and mix quickly with bacon and egg mixture.
Serve with extra parmesan and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
ingredients: Spices: cumin, coriander, turmeric, garam masala
instructions: Marinate chicken in spices and yogurt for 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry the chicken until cooked.
Fry onions and add tomato puree.
Add chicken and cook for another 5 minutes.
